alert.note: Alert for Estancia Valley; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 24 at 2:41PM MST until February 27 at 1:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Estancia Valley, and South Central Highlands. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Damage may occur to mobile homes, roofs, sheds, barns, outbuildings, and fences. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust may create reduced visibility at lower elevations and blowing snow at higher elevations.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Estancia Valley; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Highlands
